languages.text: {n}Мимолетного взгляда на простертое тело Винтерскейла хватает, чтобы к горлу подкатила тошнота. Пытки — одно это слово заставляет вас сжаться от постыдного ужаса. В голове мутится от {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}воспоминаний{/d}, которые вы все эти годы безуспешно пытались загнать в дальний угол памяти.{/n}

{n}A fleeting glance at Winterscale's outstretched body is enough to turn your stomach. Torture — the very word makes you cringe in shameful horror. Your mind reels with the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}memories{/d} you have tried unsuccessfully to push to the back of your mind all these years.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мимолетного взгляда на простертое тело Винтерскейла хватает, чтобы к горлу подкатила тошнота. Пытки — одно это слово заставляет вас сжаться от постыдного ужаса. В голове мутится от {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}воспоминаний{/d}, которые вы все эти годы безуспешно пытались загнать в дальний угол памяти.{/n}

{n}A fleeting glance at Winterscale's outstretched body is enough to turn your stomach. Torture — the very word makes you cringe in shameful horror. Your mind reels with the memories you have tried unsuccessfully to push to the back of your mind all these years.{/n}

{n}A fleeting glance at Winterscale's outstretched body is enough to turn your stomach. Torture — the very word makes you cringe in shameful horror. Your mind reels with the memories you have tried unsuccessfully to push to the back of your mind all these years.{/n}

{n}A fleeting glance at Winterscale's outstretched body is enough to turn your stomach. Torture — the very word makes you cringe in shameful horror. Your mind reels with the memories you have tried unsuccessfully to push to the back of your mind all these years.{/n}

languages.text: {n}光是看到年轻的温特斯凯尔勋爵的身体，就让你仿佛要呕吐出来。“折磨”这个词浮现在你脑海中，让你心生恐惧，畏缩不已。这么多年来，你一直试图把那些痛苦的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}记忆{/d}抛到脑后，但看起来并没有奏效。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fleeting glance at Winterscale's outstretched body is enough to turn your stomach. Torture — the very word makes you cringe in shameful horror. Your mind reels with the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}memories{/d} you have tried unsuccessfully to push to the back of your mind all these years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}光是看到年轻的温特斯凯尔勋爵的身体，就让你仿佛要呕吐出来。“折磨”这个词浮现在你脑海中，让你心生恐惧，畏缩不已。这么多年来，你一直试图把那些痛苦的记忆抛到脑后，但看起来并没有奏效。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con una breve mirada al cuerpo de Winterscale se te revuelven las tripas. Tortura. La mera palabra hace que te estremezcas, presa de un horror vergonzoso. Los {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}recuerdos{/d} que llevas años intentando reprimir inundan tu mente una vez más.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fleeting glance at Winterscale's outstretched body is enough to turn your stomach. Torture — the very word makes you cringe in shameful horror. Your mind reels with the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}memories{/d} you have tried unsuccessfully to push to the back of your mind all these years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una breve mirada al cuerpo de Winterscale se te revuelven las tripas. Tortura. La mera palabra hace que te estremezcas, presa de un horror vergonzoso. Los recuerdos que llevas años intentando reprimir inundan tu mente una vez más.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ウィンタースケールの引き伸ばされた身体を一目見ただけで、胃液が逆流するように感じた。拷問…その言葉自体が、あなたを恥ずべき恐怖の底へと突き落とす。この数年間、心の奥底に封じ込めようとして忘れられなかった{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}記憶{/d}が、心を揺さぶる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fleeting glance at Winterscale's outstretched body is enough to turn your stomach. Torture — the very word makes you cringe in shameful horror. Your mind reels with the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}memories{/d} you have tried unsuccessfully to push to the back of your mind all these years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ウィンタースケールの引き伸ばされた身体を一瞥しただけで、胃液が逆流するようだった。拷問ーーその言葉そのものが、あなたを恥ずべき恐怖の底へと突き落とす。この数年間、心の奥底に封じ込めようとして忘れられなかった記憶が、心を揺さぶる。{/n}
{n}ウィンタースケールの引き伸ばされた身体を一目見ただけで、胃液が逆流するように感じた。拷問…その言葉自体が、あなたを恥ずべき恐怖の底へと突き落とす。この数年間、心の奥底に封じ込めようとして忘れられなかった{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}記憶{/d}が、心を揺さぶる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un simple coup d'œil au corps de Winterscale suffit à vous retourner l'estomac. La torture. Le mot vous fait frissonner d'horreur et fait remonter en vous des {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}souvenirs{/d} que vous aviez tant bien que mal relégués au fin fond de votre esprit pendant toutes ces années.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fleeting glance at Winterscale's outstretched body is enough to turn your stomach. Torture — the very word makes you cringe in shameful horror. Your mind reels with the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}memories{/d} you have tried unsuccessfully to push to the back of your mind all these years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un simple coup d'œil au corps de Winterscale suffit à vous retourner l'estomac. La torture. Le mot vous fait frissonner d'horreur et fait remonter en vous des souvenirs que vous aviez tant bien que mal relégués au fin fond de votre esprit pendant toutes ces années.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein flüchtiger Blick auf Winterzunders ausgestreckte Leiche reicht aus, um dir den Magen umzudrehen. Folter – schon das bloße Wort lässt dich vor schmachvollem Entsetzen schaudern. Dein Verstand wird geflutet von den {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Erinnerungen{/d}, die du all die Jahre über vergeblich versucht hast, in den hintersten Teil deines Verstandes zu drängen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fleeting glance at Winterscale's outstretched body is enough to turn your stomach. Torture — the very word makes you cringe in shameful horror. Your mind reels with the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}memories{/d} you have tried unsuccessfully to push to the back of your mind all these years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein flüchtiger Blick auf Winterzunders ausgestreckte Leiche reicht aus, um dir den Magen umzudrehen. Folter — schon das bloße Wort lässt dich vor schmachvollem Entsetzen schaudern. Dein Verstand wird geflutet von den Erinnerungen, die du all die Jahre über vergeblich versucht hast, in den hintersten Teil deines Verstandes zu drängen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Winterscale'in uzanmış bedenine attığın bir anlık bakış, mideni kaldırmaya yetiyor. İşkence... Sadece kelimesi bile seni utanç verici bir dehşetle iki büklüm ediyor. Zihnin, bunca yıldır beyhude bir çabayla bastırmaya çalıştığı {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}anılarla{/d} dolup taşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fleeting glance at Winterscale's outstretched body is enough to turn your stomach. Torture — the very word makes you cringe in shameful horror. Your mind reels with the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}memories{/d} you have tried unsuccessfully to push to the back of your mind all these years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale'in uzanmış bedenine attığın bir anlık bakış, mideni kaldırmaya yetiyor. İşkence... Sadece kelimesi bile seni utanç verici bir dehşetle iki büklüm ediyor. Zihnin, bunca yıldır beyhude bir çabayla bastırmaya çalıştığı anılarla dolup taşıyor.{/n}
